001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003import com.technototes.library.general.Periodic;
004import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
005
006/** The class to extend custom gamepad axis from
007 * @author Alex Stedman
008 */
009public class AxisBase extends ButtonBase implements DoubleSupplier, Periodic {
010
011    /** The default trigger threshold
012     *
013     */
014    public static final double DEFAULT_TRIGGER_THRESHOLD = 0.05;
015
016    private double triggerThreshold;
017    protected DoubleSupplier doubleSupplier;
018
019    /** Make a GamepadAxis with the supplier
020     *
021     * @param d The supplier to make the axis around
022     */
023    public AxisBase(DoubleSupplier d) {
024        this(d, DEFAULT_TRIGGER_THRESHOLD);
025    }
026
027    /** Make a GamepadAxis with the supplier and the threshold for the stick to behave as a button
028     *
029     * @param d The supplier to make the axis around
030     * @param t The threshold
031     */
032    public AxisBase(DoubleSupplier d, double t) {
033        super(() -> Math.abs(d.getAsDouble()) >= t);
034        doubleSupplier = d;
035        triggerThreshold = t;
036    }
037
038    /** Returns the double from the axis
039     *
040     * @return The double
041     */
042    @Override
043    public double getAsDouble() {
044        if (isDisabled()) return 0;
045        return getInverted() ? -doubleSupplier.getAsDouble() : doubleSupplier.getAsDouble();
046    }
047
048    /** Gets the trigger threshold
049     *
050     * @return The threshold
051     */
052    public double getTriggerThreshold() {
053        return triggerThreshold;
054    }
055
056    /** Set threshold
057     * @param threshold the new threshold
058     */
059    public AxisBase setTriggerThreshold(double threshold) {
060        triggerThreshold = threshold;
061        return this;
062    }
063}
